ygData.subject: Fishbone Earing advice...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Lately I ve been getting on in levels and have begun to start thinking about kedge keep as an underpopulated place I could go to gain some exp. That
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

Lately I've been getting on in levels and have begun to start thinking about
kedge keep as an underpopulated place I could go to gain some exp. That
being said the natural progression is to pick up some fishbone earings.

So...

I'm here for some advice. I don't want to spoil anyone's fun so I won't
mention the name of the mob or the zone, I was just wondering if any of you
have killed him firsthand. If so, what level would you recommend for soloing
him or for a party killing him. Also, what faction hits do you take (if you
remember)

Draelon Stormsong
the Tribunal
(1 song away from being every caster's best friend)
